about_the_game:
Last Dream II fuses the best features of classic RPGs: engaging storylines, refined mechanics, deeply balanced game play, and complete immersion into a vast world, rich with detail.

  • 50+ hours of dynamic gameplay
  • 30+ additional hours of immersive side quests
  • 200+ musical compositions from talented, independent artists
  • Built with the Godot Engine and 100% custom graphics
  • Single and multi-playthrough achievements
  • Comprehensive Strategy Guide and Walkthrough

Key Features


Captain your four-character party through the perilous and unpredictable world of Gaia.

  • Thoughtfully-crafted storyline with memorable characters
  • Adjustable difficulty and game modes for a flexible challenge
  • Dynamic time-based battle system
  • 4-character party selected from 12 unique classes
  • Build each character's attributes as you see fit
  • Tailor your party's strengths through branching class upgrades
  • Unlock a wide diversity of class skills and skill upgrades
  • Utilize powerful "Overdrive" skills to turn the tide of battle
  • Adapt your equipment to your needs through gem socketing
  • Gain the power of the ancients through Set Equipment
  • Enhance your inventory through item synthesis
  • Mining, fishing, and farming mini-games
  • Leaderboards!

Deeply Balanced Gameplay


Immerse yourself in the world of Gaia and the epic story of Last Dream II. Follow the convergence of your four selected party members through unique character prologues and learn the mysteries of their pasts as you guide your party through the world.

Complex Role Playing – Explore a vast RPG where the decisions you make change the world around you. Will you pay the Captain's fee, delve into the uncharted depths of a poisonous bog in search of a lost artifact, or even explore the decaying remnants of an ancient temple in search of forgotten riches? The choice is yours.

Tremendous Replayability – Last Dream allows the freedom to choose any 4-character party you wish from 12 distinctive character classes. With over 11,000 party variations, you’ll never run out of new experiences. In addition to myriad party combinations and various selectable difficulty levels, you can also build each character as you see fit, so the possibilities are nearly endless.

Side Quests and Mini-Games Galore – Whether you prefer the ecstasy of gold unearthed while mining, the relaxation of casting your line for fish on a warm, sunny day, or the satisfaction of being self-sufficient and growing your own food and herbs, Last Dream II is packed with gameplay enhancements.

Development


Our development team is comprised of people who deeply cherish the RPGs of our childhoods. We began developing Last Dream to be the central element of our decades-running annual RPG Tournament. That is, we started with the sole desire to craft an enduring game that we would personally enjoy.

After the release of our flagship game, Last Dream, we had numerous ideas on how we could improve the gaming experience. After years of collecting, culling, and refining those ideas, we've fused them into the foundation for Last Dream II, the second in our planned trilogy of the Last Dream series.
